content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Take Joe Danger on a death-defying thrill ride across the set of the greatest blockbuster movie ever made.
Chase crooks on your police bike, destroy laser firing robots with a stolen jetpack, escape giant boulders in a minecart, time-travel to punch dinosaurs and divert the nuclear missiles on your unicycle!
Beat your friends in fun, intense 4 player multiplayer, featuring unique vehicles like snowmobiles, jetpacks, unicycles, skis and motorbikes!
Every time you play, your Ghost is uploaded to the cloud! Race online against friends, rivals or become famous as the world number one. Use tricks and combos to rule the leaderboards.
Download an endless supply of new scenes from around the world, or create your own in the Movie Maker!

1-4 players
6MB minimum save size
HDTV screen resolution: 720p, 1080i, 1080p
Network Features

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement and this item's use restrictions. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
